content: अभिनिवेशिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Devoted to, intent on, adhering or clinging to; कल्याणाभिनिवेशिनः <ls>K. 136</ls> of blessed or noble resolve, <ls n="K.">191.</ls> {@--2@} Fixing on, directing or turning (the mind) to; गुणेष्वभिनिवेशिनो भर्तुरपि प्रिया <ls>M. 3</ls>; अहो नु खलु दुर्लभ °शी मदनः <ls>V. 1</ls>; <ls>Dk. 57.</ls> {@--3@} Determined, resolute.
